name: Olympic Smashdown
description:
After 20 years of training, and three failed olympic gold attempts, Simona Smash chokes on the biggest game of her life. Her disappointed coach tells her “you should have just smashed”. Taking those words to heart, she sets out to show her coach what smashing really means…

How to play:

Move around with  WASD, swing racket with left-click, reflect balls into enemies to deal damage or whack them with your racket for small damage. Press E when near an upgrade to take it. Press Space to dash.

Tips and Tricks:

  1. Don't try to reflect bowling balls.
  2. Don't forget to read.
  3. Don't do drugs.
